comments: Laguerre transform is A052563. [From _Paul Barry_, Aug 08 2008]
links: INRIA Algorithms Project, Encyclopedia of Combinatorial Structures 530
formula: E.g.f.: -1/(-1+x+2*x^2)Recurrence: {a(1)=1, a(0)=1, (-2*n^2-6*n-4)*a(n)+(-2-n)*a(n+1)+a(n+2)=0}Sum(1/9*(1+4*_alpha)*_alpha^(-1-n), _alpha=RootOf(-1+_Z+2*_Z^2))*n!a(n)=n!*A001045(n+1). [From _Paul Barry_, Aug 08 2008] a(n) = D^n(1/(1-x)) evaluated at x = 0, where D is the operator sqrt(1+8*x)*d/dx. Cf. A080599 and A005442. - Peter Bala, Dec 07 2011
author: encyclopedia(AT)pommard.inria.fr, Jan 25 2000
